title: Deep Map Object Keys
description: In this lab, we will explore how to use the deepMapKeys function in JavaScript to map an object's keys recursively. We will learn how to create a new object with the same values and mapped keys using a provided function for each key. Through hands-on exercises and examples, we will understand how this function works and how it can be used in practical scenarios.

meta.title: Deep Map Object Keys in JavaScript
meta.description: Learn how to use the deepMapKeys function to recursively map object keys in JavaScript.

verify.name: Verify Node Commands in ZSH History
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.
